member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WebServiceTask.WebServiceTaskUtil.GetServices
member.summary: Returns an array that contains all the services available in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
member.returns: An array of type String that contains a list of all the services.

member.summary: Gets an array that contains all the methods available in a service.

member.param: The name of the service.

member.summary: Calls the specified Web method with the supplied parameters.
